D

Deck - Class in components
The Deck class represents a deck of cards used in a card game.
Deck() - Constructor for class components.Deck
Constructs a new Deck and initializes it by creating and shuffling the cards.
declaredUno() - Method in class components.players.Player
Checks if the player has declared Uno.
draw() - Method in class components.Deck
Draws a card from the deck.
DRAW_TWO - Enum constant in enum class utils.CardType
Represents a Draw Two card that requires the next player to draw two cards.
DumbComputerPlayer - Class in components.players
The DumbComputerPlayer class represents a simple computer player in a card game.
DumbComputerPlayer() - Constructor for class components.players.DumbComputerPlayer
Constructs a new DumbComputerPlayer with the default name "Simple Computer Player."
DumbComputerPlayer(String) - Constructor for class components.players.DumbComputerPlayer
Constructs a new DumbComputerPlayer with the specified name.
